pages.title: ! Commands
pages.text: Type these in the chat screen for instant actions (no AI processing):$(br2)$(thing)!follow$() — Switch to FOLLOW mode$(br)$(thing)!stay$() — Switch to STAY mode$(br)$(thing)!auto$() — Switch to AUTO mode$(br)$(thing)!come$() / $(thing)!here$() — Teleport companion to you$(br)$(thing)!status$() — Show current task status$(br)$(thing)!cancel$() / $(thing)!stop$() — Cancel all tasks$(br)$(thing)!equip$() — Force re-equip best gear$(br)$(thing)!health$() / $(thing)!hp$() — Show health$(br)$(thing)!help$() / $(thing)?$() — Show command list
